mods.abstract: Page 122 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 [6] shows rows of cauliflower crops in a field at the State Experiment Station at Baton Rouge.; Photograph 2 [5] shows cauliflower crops in a field at the State Experiment Station at Baton Rouge. Two men in suits and hats standing far left.; Photograph 3 [7] shows a field of cauliflower crops at the State Experiment Station at Baton Rouge. Leafless trees in the distance, clouds in the sky.
mods.note: Compare Photographs 1-3 to the following publication. Tiebout, G.L. (1913, May) Preliminary Report on Winter Cauliflower. Louisiana Bulletin, No. 140, p. 2. Photograph caption reads, "Field of Cauliflower at Experiment Station of Louisiana State University, Baton Rouge."

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
